name: Baseball Dice - GMTK 2022
description:
Found out about the jam with less than 24 hours to submit! Wanted to see if i could turn baseball dice into a computer game. its rough but it functions? its basically just a slot machine. this is my first jam game ever and im happy i finally made one even if its not my own game. its a project made with a deadline. ill do better next time.

Background image provided by - www.vecteezy.com
